tossup_question: -   –  The Seven Bridges of Konigsberg was a historically notable problem in graph theory and topology that was resolved by what mathematician?
bonus_question: -   –  A particle moves along a curve with equations x = 4cos t; y = 4sin t; z = 6t. What is the speed of the particle at time t = pi/2?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: 2 times the square root of 13
